I.lead: Between Schlieren and Glanzenberg on the Zürich HB - Lenzburg line, no train services are operating.
I.text:
Disruption: Between Schlieren and Glanzenberg on the Zürich HB - Lenzburg line, no train services are operating.
International trains TGV Zürich HB - Paris Gare de Lyon are cancelled between Zürich HB and Basel SBB.
Trains IC / IR / ICE (Chur) - Zürich HB - Basel SBB are cancelled between Zürich HB and Basel SBB.
Trains IR Chur - Zürich HB - Liestal - Basel SBB are cancelled between Zürich HB and Aarau.
Trains IR 20xx / Zürich HB - Bern are cancelled between Zürich HB and Aarau.
Special trains operating Zürich HB - Baden - Brugg AG - Aarau.
Special trains operating Aarau - Brugg AG - Baden - Zürich HB.
The trains IR Zürich Flughafen - Basel SBB do not stop in Zürich Oerlikon, Zürich Altstetten + Dietikon.
Trains IC Romanshorn - Brig are cancelled between Zürich HB and Bern.
Trains IC St.Gallen - Genève-Aéroport are cancelled between Zürich HB and Bern.
Trains IR 19xx / Zürich HB - Bern are cancelled between Zürich HB and Baden.
Trains are cancelled between Zürich HB and Aarau.
Trains IR Konstanz - Biel/Bienne are cancelled between Zürich HB and Olten.
S-Bahn trains S3 / Wetzikon - Aarau are cancelled between Zürich Altstetten and Dietikon.
S-Bahn trains S12/ Winterthur - Brugg AG are cancelled between Zürich Altstetten and Dietikon.
Passengers travelling from Mellingen Heitersberg to Baden or vice versa travel via Postauto Linienverkehr.
Replacement bus services are operating Zürich Altstetten - Schlieren - Dietikon.
Passengers travelling from Tessin to Bern, Olten + Basel SBB via Luzern.
We advise against travelling for the time being.
Reason: Fire near track
Duration of disruption indefinite.

I.lead: Train services at Zürich Hardbrücke station are subject to restrictions.
I.text:
Restriction: Train services at Zürich Hardbrücke station are subject to restrictions.
S-Bahn trains S16 / Schaffhausen - Herrliberg Feldmeilen are cancelled between Zürich-Flughafen and Zürich Tiefenbrunnen.
The trains S7 / Winterthur - Rapperswil make an unscheduled stop in Zürich Tiefenbrunnen.
Passengers travelling from Zürich Flughafen to Zürich Tiefenbrunnen or vice versa travel via Zürich Oerlikon.
Delays of approx. 15 minutes can be expected.
Reason: Track damage
Duration of disruption expected until 11:30.
